title: Living Sideways

elliot_state.temporal_awareness: Living in four timeline states simultaneously
key_realizations: Consciousness can exist across multiple probability streams
Failed timelines show ways to avoid collapse
Becoming quantum is necessary for survival
Each death is real in those probability branches

key_quotes: I died again this morning. Or I will die tomorrow. Or I died three iterations ago.
Tense stops making sense when you're living in four temporal streams simultaneously.
